author: paulhauner
content: I'm interested as to which clients are using a lockfile for EIP-2335 voting keystores when in-use by a VC? We're currently using `<keystore-filename>.lock`, so `my-keystore.json` gets a `my-keystore.json.lock` file, but I'm not attached to it. If other clients are using lockfiles it probably makes sense for us to standarize on this. It's worthwhile low-hanging fruit IMO.

author: benjaminion
content: <@!361447803194441738> Teku is not currently using lock files like this, but I've made an issue to look into it - seems worthwhile.
